array.string: Sumerian cuneiform is the earliest known writing system. It developed from the pictographs and other symbols used to represent trade goods and livestock on clay tablets.
The First Dynasty of ancient Egypt covers the first series of Egyptian kings to rule over a unified Egypt. It immediately follows the unification of Upper and Lower Egypt, possibly by Narmer
Discoveries of Maya occupation at Cuello, Belize and settlements were established in the Soconusco region of the Pacific coast, and they were already cultivating the staple crops of the Maya.
The Great Pyramid of Giza is completed
The Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest monument on the list of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
Stonehenge is a prehistoric monument in Wiltshire, England, two miles (3 km) west of Amesbury. It consists of a ring of standing stones weighing around 25 tons.
Composition of the Iliad and the Odyssey
Homer is the legendary author of the Iliad and the Odyssey, two epic poems that are the central works of ancient Greek literature. The Iliad is set during the Trojan War.
